en: The checkpoint has been rebuilt after the resistance attack. Security is unprecedented, with propaganda broadcasts praising the "brave defenders."
I've been promoted to Regional Director of Border Security and [pulse freq=2]Root Reserve Distribution[/pulse].
Russet pins a small medal to your uniform. Assistant Regional Director... for your unwavering loyalty to Spud.
I have a special assignment! Prime Minister Idaho will be inspecting our facility today. You've been selected for demonstration.
Have you seen the new batch of Root Reserve? They're calling it 'Resistance Blend' after what happened to those captives.
Some are saying the resistance wasn't completely wrong. That there's [wave amp=15 freq=3]evidence they were telling the truth[/wave]...
"Be careful. Even talking like that is dangerous now." (Cautious)
"I've had the same thoughts. This doesn't feel right." (Sympathetic)
Not everyone believes the official story anymore. Keep your eyes open during the Prime Minister's visit.
There's a new resistance forming. Quieter, more careful. If you want to know more... watch for the yellow spud emblem.
ATTENTION: Prime Minister Idaho's motorcade has arrived. All officers to assigned stations. Inspection protocols in effect.
Your medal feels heavy - a reward for loyalty, or a mark of shame? Soon you'll face the architect of Root Reserve.
After the broadcast exposing Root Reserve, uprisings have erupted across Spud. Prime Minister Idaho remains barricaded in the administration building.
Idaho plans one final broadcast to blame Root Reserve on us. We cannot let him rewrite history. Today, we end his regime.
You saved my life at the processing plant. Now we have a chance to save all of Spud.
Your knowledge of security protocols will be crucial for the final mission. Are you ready?
"I'm ready. Let's finish what we started."
"What exactly is the plan? I need details."
I knew you wouldn't back down. You're one of our [tornado radius=3 freq=2]strongest allies[/tornado].
We'll infiltrate using government uniforms. You'll help bypass security systems. Our goal is to capture Idaho and force a public confession.
You'll be on Team Alpha with Sasha, breaching the east entrance. Your objective: [color=GREEN]secure the broadcast center[/color].
From loyal customs officer to resistance fighter? It's a transformation you never imagined. Whatever happens, Spud will never be the same.
